## Viewport.refreshElement() method

Update the size/offset of the element with the given id, and adjust viewport bounds.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refreshElement(elId: string, doNotRecalculateBounds?: boolean): ViewportElement<T["E"]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  elId | string |  |
|  doNotRecalculateBounds | boolean | If true, the viewport's bounds won't be recalculated after the element's size and position has been refreshed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ViewportElement](./core.viewportelement)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt;
